title: Motorola Edge 30 Pro tipped to take on Galaxy S22 Ultra with its own stylus
content:
Samsung’s Galaxy Note line was one of the only ways to get a stylus with your phone for years, but that has certainly started to change. This year, it seems Motorola is ready to adopt stylus support on one of its flagship phones in the Edge 30 Pro, according to a new leak at least.

more…

The post Motorola Edge 30 Pro tipped to take on Galaxy S22 Ultra with its own stylus appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A new leak of the Motorola Edge 30 Pro shows that the phone will work with a stylus, just like Samsung's iconic phones.
